title: Fizz Impossible S or S+ for LVL 7
body:
It is literally impossible for fizz S 

17/1/8 221 S-
15/1/10 228 S- 

Can You FIx the Rankings PLEASE

replies.body: It feels it's impossible to get the same for Kai'sa - I just need one last one and have had a few perfect games lately I felt were really deserving.
Same goes for you, especially with ADCs you have to bump up that CS per minute to get the S ranks, it's not all about KDA. Aim for at least 8.

CS is a significant factor in rankings. Poor CS per minute will basically lock you out of those ranks. Your current CS per min on Fizz is about 5~, you need to be aiming for *at least* 7-8, so that would be the first place to start if you're looking to get those tokens. The KDA you need to compensate for low CS is obnoxiously high.
